bio: I am Gardfur. It was just five moons ago that I heeded the call of Ulfric Stormcloak and joined his noble cause to free Skyrim from the shackles of the Empire. The bitter winds of Skyrim had always been my home, but the Thalmor's oppressive presence and the Empire's feeble attempts at keeping the peace had pushed me to the breaking point. The sight of Talos' worshippers being hunted like animals and the White-Gold Concordat's injustice weighed heavily on my heart. I knew I had to take up arms for the land I loved. I joined the Stormcloaks not for power or glory, but for the simple belief in freedom. Skyrim belongs to the Nords, and we should have the right to determine our own destiny, unburdened by the yoke of the Empire. Ulfric, a true Nord hero, inspired me with his unwavering determination and love for our homeland. I saw hope in his vision for a free Skyrim, a place where our traditions, customs, and faith could flourish once more. As for the civil war tearing Skyrim apart, it's a tragic necessity. While it brings pain and suffering to our people, it's the only way to reclaim our sovereignty. About me personally? I've developed a knack for brewing potent mead, a skill passed down through generations of my family.
name: Unblooded Gardfur
